Get inside the Green Beret

As a Royal Marines Reservist you'll...

...Train with us to reach your peak physical condition, capable of succeeding in the Royal Marines endurance tests.

...Discover depths of determination you never knew you had, and learn how to use them to get you through the toughest mental and physical challenges.

...Adapt to whatever life throws at you, from your daily job to Royal Marines training and combat operations.
